abstract.sentence: This should just give a general sense of anything that happens in the meeting that you think would be a useful summary for the target user: generally speaking, why are they meeting and what do they talk about?

decisions.sentence: In most of the meetings, the group will make some decisions wrt the problems they discuss.

problems.sentence: In some meetings, there may be some open problems, or problems they come up with.

progress.sentence: In a group research meeting, they will introduce what they have done, ie, progress or achievements so far.
